name: nav-invoicedata-to-html
description: Hungarian NAV online invoice invoiceData xml to html view

scripts.build: sh sh/templateGen.sh && rm -rf build/* && npx tsc
scripts.release:patch: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
